definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: It has just come to our notice that the Japanese camera canon manufactured by seiki- kogaku, tokyo, is very popular.
sentences.chinese: 久闻东京精机光学厂生产的“佳能”照相机颇有名气。

sentences.english: In addition, a compact Canon G11 camera is always with me.
sentences.chinese: 此外我随身携带一部佳能G11小型相机。

sentences.english: Oh yes, I have to use a tripod to rest my Canon on.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我必须用三脚架支撑我的佳能小钢炮。

sentences.english: This promotion offer is only applicable to Canon Hongkong Co.
sentences.chinese: 此优惠只适用于佳能香港有限公司之原装行货。

sentences.english: The Book of Malachi is the last in the canon of the Old Testament Prophets.
sentences.chinese: 该玛拉基书是最后一次在佳能的旧约先知。

sentences.english: Realistic Canon lens mug is a must-have for any photographer.
sentences.chinese: 逼真的佳能镜头杯是任何摄影师的必备品。

sentences.english: The performance of these meters corresponded to the Class II standards of OIML testing rules.
sentences.chinese: 两种水分计之佳能符合国际计量组织二级标准。

sentences.english: The sensor, for which Canon has announced no production plans, has a pixel count nearly 7.5 times larger than the company's highest pixel count commercially available sensor.
sentences.chinese: 对于这款传感器，佳能公司还没有任何量产计划。

sentences.english: These books, therefore, stand in the relation of Apocrypha to the Jewish canon.
sentences.chinese: 这些书籍，因此，站在关系的伪经犹太佳能。

sentences.english: Canon is one of our best sellers, too.
sentences.chinese: 佳能是我们的畅销货之一。

sentences.english: This is an authentic dictionary of Buddhist doctrinal terms, used in the Pali Canon and its Commentaries.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个真实的字典佛教教义，用八里佳能及其评论。

sentences.english: And since they are also Canon people , they show no mercy?
sentences.chinese: 既然他们也是佳能的员工，那他们就不能宽容一点吗？

sentences.english: The corporate philosophy of Canon is kyosei.
sentences.chinese: 我们把佳能公司的经营哲学称之为kyosei。

sentences.english: I've been amazing people for at least seven years with what I pull out Canon's compacts.
sentences.chinese: 至少七年来我的佳能小相机拍出的照片一直令人惊叹。

definition: Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments
